channel.title: VisualStudio on Codewrecks
channel.description: Recent content in VisualStudio on Codewrecks

item.title: Remove submodule completely from your git repository
item.description: I have a project that uses git submodules in the past then they are removed long time ago, no-one had problem but I’ve noticed that Visual Studio had some strange warning during the build. 1 warning : Could not find a part of the path 'C:\develop\xxx\submodules\jarvis.catalog\.git'. The source code won't be available via Source Link. It seems that Visual Studio Integration with Git still found information on submodules and tried to check something in corresponding folders.
